activities: MedPro Systems LLC ("MedPro") is dedicated to helping members of the pharmaceutical and medical device industries understand the regulatory environment that impacts their business, and it provides services and resources to companies in the life sciences industry to help them stay compliant with governing law. MedPro anticipates receiving and collecting personal information from individuals in the European Union (“EU”) and Switzerland.  MedPro has established a comprehensive privacy program that has been designed to and is intended to protect your data privacy rights.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: MedPro Systems LLC is registered with the Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor Program.
